original_text: Then he said to them, ‘I told you about these things while I was still with you. Everything that God's servants wrote about me in the Bible had to happen. Moses wrote about me in his book of God's Law. The prophets also wrote about me. The book called Psalms also tells about me. And now it has become true.’
korean_text: 또 이르시되 내가 너희와 함께 있을 때에 너희에게 말한 바 곧 모세의 율법과 선지자의 글과 시편에 나를 가리켜 기록된 모든 것이 이루어져야 하리라 한 말이 이것이라 하시고

sentences.original_text: I told you about these things
while I was still with you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 아직 너희와 함께 있을 때

sentences.original_text: Everything that God's servants wrote about me
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 종들이 나에 대해 기록한 모든 것

sentences.original_text: in the Bible had to happen
sentences.korean_translation: 성경에 기록된 것은 반드시 일어나야 했다

sentences.original_text: in his book of God's Law
The prophets also wrote about me
The book called Psalms also tells about me
And now it has become true
